SELECT w.worker_name,w.worker_image, IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(cust_name),"/") as cust_details,c.cust_address, IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(h.send_water_count),0) as send_water_count FROM tb_worker w LEFT JOIN tb_history h on w.wid=h.worker_id LEFT JOIN tb_customer c on c.cid=h.cust_id
and w.worker_name like concat('%',#{workerName},'%')
GROUP BY w.wid order by send_water_count DESC
